Name: Fissure
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 5. Ranged. Deal Damage to the Target equal to its Remaining HP, plus 1 Lethal Damage. If the Target is Out of Range due to using the Move 'Dig' this Move hits anyways.
Description: The user tears the ground apart in a monstrous display of force. If the foe falls through the fissure, it might need a rescue team to get it out.
